subject: Concussions
Super Bowl
Sports Injuries
Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Players at Super Bowl media day discussed how football is being affected by head injuries and the mounting evidence that long-term brain damage can be linked to injuries sustained on the field.
snippet: Players at Super Bowl media day discussed how football is being affected by head injuries and the mounting evidence that long-term brain damage can be linked to injuries sustained on the field.
